dmca.title: Attorney Demands Removal of "Lawyer From Hell" Sites
dmca.body:
[private] LLB(Hons) B COM                           
Barrister & Solicitor                                 
    
Google, Inc.
Attn Customer Support DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA, 94043
United States of America
   
Dear Sirs
   
                           DMCA Complaint
    
I write to complain about infringements of copyrights held by me (which are also defamatory of me, but I realise defamation is outside of thee ambit of this complaint procedure). The search query which brings up each of the pages below is "[private]".
    
The results are as follows:
  
1. "[private] - Lawyer From Hell" - http://www.peterbarter.com/trevor/law.html.  The infringing material is all text in black in the box starting "From: [private]".
    
2. "[private] - The Attorney From Hell' --http://www.coppcar.org/raskol.html--the three photographs on this page are infringing.  
    
3. "[private] - Mal Practice" -- http://www.[private].com -- the photograph on this page is infringing.
    
4. "[private]- Rascal Watch" -- http://www.peterbarter.com/trevor/<private>.html -- the text starting "From: "[private]" is infringing.
    
5. "[private] Parody" -- http://www.[private].com/parody/ -- the photograph on this page is infringing.
    
6. "Coppcar - Stop Priestly Perversions" --http://www.coppcar.org/ -- the photograph on this page is infringing.
    
7. "[private]" -- http://www.drdan-bibleman.com/[private]:html -- the text starting "From: [private]" is infringing.
    
8. "www.boybonkers.com" -- http://www.boybonkers.com/ -- the photograph on this page is infringing.
    
9. "Coppcar - Stop Priestly Perversions" -- http://www.coppcar.com -- the photograph on this page is infringing.
    
The originals of the copyrighted works infringed on these pages are not available online any longer, but I can send them to you by email if you wish.
    
All pages the subject of my complaint are mantained by The same individual, [private], whose contact details are contained on the bottom of each of the above pages.
      
[private]
	
[private] LLB (Hons) B Com                               
Barrister and Solicitor
    
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright ovvner, its agent, or the law.
    
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    
You may contact me at the email address [private].
    
Yours faithfully
    
[private]
    
Page 2 of 2
